title: Cowboys, Patriots, and the NBA
itunes:title: Cowboys, Patriots, and the NBA
description:
Filling in for Colin, Doug Gottlieb explains what the Dallas Cowboys are doing wrong, what the New England Patriots will never do, and what he would do for the NBA playoffs. Guests include Greg Cosell, Mark Schlereth, and Chris Mannix.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
